review: I was really disappointed that I cannot access VUDU.  The remote is super sensitive and the least little touch changes my television to the Fire TV Stick content.  I literally place the remote for the Fire Stick in a drawer to avoid anything accidentally touching it and changing the television.  I gave it a three because it gets the job done, but the menus are not the easiest to search.

If you're a prime member and have the netflix and hulu plus there is really no need for cable except for sports and news. But its a small price to pay for the savings from Comcast.

author: Tyrone West

review: GOOD:Watch Hulu+ & Netflix without any buffering.Clear sound and sharp picture.Easy to navigate and easy to use remote.BAD:When left plugged in and not in use (sleep mode) it will continuously use data/internet connectivity therefore any data usage limits will be exceeded in your home [ISP's have data usage limits that may charge you extra if you go over that limit, Amazon did state they know there is constant connectivity even when in sleep mode...]The stick gets hot to the touch after running for an hour or longer [going along with the previous statement, we have to leave unplugged completely when not in use].Occasionally the shows/movies will have picture distortion, even when just starting to use the system [resets and hardboots do not repair, eventually goes back to normal on own].***Overall it's a great product for a great price***
